long_term.title: Billionaire Investor Henry Kravis Makes First Crypto Investment
long_term.summary: Billionaire investor Henry Kravis, co-founder of KKR & Co., has reportedly made his first investment in the cryptocurrency space by investing in a fund offered by ParaFi Capital. This move signifies growing institutional interest and validation for digital assets, potentially attracting further traditional finance players into the crypto market. Kravis's involvement, even indirectly, signals a positive long-term sentiment from established investors.
long_term.rationale: The entry of a prominent billionaire investor like Henry Kravis into crypto, even through a fund, is a strong signal of increasing institutional acceptance. This can attract more capital and legitimacy to the asset class over the long term.

long_term.title: Bullish Billionaire Investor Regrets Not Selling Bitcoin at $13,800
long_term.summary: Galaxy Investment Partners CEO Mike Novogratz, a known Bitcoin bull, expressed regret over not selling more Bitcoin at its 2019 high of $13,800. Despite this, he remains long on Bitcoin. This statement, while indicating a short-term pullback, reinforces his long-term bullish conviction. Such sentiment from influential figures can influence market psychology and adoption trends over time.
long_term.rationale: Novogratz's continued bullish stance, even after a pullback, highlights sustained confidence from a major industry figure. This sentiment can foster long-term investor interest and contribute to market stability and growth.

long_term.title: $11,000 and Climbing: Bitcoin Is Experiencing a 'Fairly Extraordinary' Bounce-Back
long_term.summary: Bitcoin surpassed $11,000 for the first time in 15 months, recovering over half of its previous gains. KR1 Plc CEO George McDonaugh described the bounce-back as 'fairly extraordinary,' suggesting that capital that left the asset was waiting to re-enter. This indicates a strong underlying demand and a potential for sustained growth, attracting new mainstream investors.
long_term.rationale: The significant price recovery and commentary from industry leaders suggest a strong resurgence in investor confidence. This could lead to broader adoption and a more robust long-term upward trend.

long_term.title: Bitcoin Price Hits New 2019 High Inching Closer to $10,000 ‘FOMO’
long_term.summary: Bitcoin reached a new 2019 high, trading near $9,800 and outperforming most major cryptocurrencies. This marks a significant bullish trend over the past three months, with monthly gains reaching 26.5%. The price action is creating a 'fear of missing out' (FOMO) among investors, potentially driving further adoption and price appreciation.
long_term.rationale: Hitting new yearly highs and generating FOMO indicates strong market momentum and increasing investor interest. This positive sentiment is likely to sustain for several months, driving further adoption.

long_term.title: CME Bitcoin Futures Briefly Broke $10,000 Amidst a New Open Interest All-Time High
long_term.summary: Bitcoin futures on the CME briefly surpassed $10,000, reaching a new 2019 high. This coincided with an all-time high in open interest for CME Bitcoin futures, reaching approximately $273 million. The increased activity and price milestone on a regulated exchange like CME suggest growing institutional participation and confidence in Bitcoin as an asset class.
long_term.rationale: Breaking $10,000 on a regulated futures market like CME, coupled with record open interest, signals strong institutional demand. This institutional adoption is a key driver for long-term price appreciation.

long_term.title: BitMEX’s owner gives $60,000 grant to Bitcoin Core developer
long_term.summary: HDR Global Trading, the owner of BitMEX, has provided a $60,000 grant to Bitcoin Core developer Michael Ford. Ford is a maintainer of the Bitcoin codebase, responsible for merging new code. This funding supports the core infrastructure of Bitcoin, ensuring its continued development and security. Such contributions are vital for the long-term health and scalability of the network.
long_term.rationale: Financial support for core developers strengthens the Bitcoin protocol itself. This investment in infrastructure is crucial for long-term network stability and innovation, indirectly supporting price.

long_term.title: US Justice Department & IRS Are in Hot Pursuit of Bitcoin Tax Evaders
long_term.summary: The U.S. Department of Justice and the IRS are intensifying efforts to prosecute Bitcoin tax evaders. This increased regulatory scrutiny, while potentially creating short-term uncertainty, signals a maturing market where compliance is becoming paramount. Over the long term, clearer regulatory frameworks and enforcement can foster greater institutional trust and adoption.
long_term.rationale: Increased regulatory enforcement on tax evasion, while potentially creating short-term headwinds, can lead to greater market legitimacy and institutional trust in the long run. This is a sign of market maturation.

long_term.title: Andreessen Horowitz: How Facebook's Libra Cryptocurrency Will Be Governed
long_term.summary: Venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz will have significant influence in governing Facebook's Libra cryptocurrency, alongside 27 other founding members in the Libra Association. This collaboration between major tech and VC firms highlights a significant push towards mainstream adoption of digital currencies, potentially setting precedents for future decentralized governance models and increasing overall crypto awareness.
long_term.rationale: The involvement of major players like Andreessen Horowitz in governing Facebook's Libra signals a significant step towards mainstream crypto adoption. This can increase overall awareness and potentially drive innovation in decentralized governance.

long_term.title: Andrew Yang Super PAC Will Accept Lightning-Powered Bitcoin Donations
long_term.summary: Andrew Yang's presidential campaign super PAC, Humanity Forward Fund, will accept donations via the Lightning Network, a Bitcoin scaling solution. This marks the first time the Lightning Network could directly impact a U.S. presidential election. It signifies growing adoption and practical use cases for Bitcoin's scaling technology, potentially increasing its utility and visibility.
long_term.rationale: The acceptance of Lightning Network donations in a U.S. presidential campaign demonstrates real-world adoption and utility for Bitcoin's scaling solutions. This can boost the network's visibility and encourage further development.

long_term.title: Twitter Founder Jack Dorsey Expounds on Planned Crypto Team
long_term.summary: Twitter and Square founder Jack Dorsey detailed his plans for Square Crypto, a new team focused on improving the crypto sector. This initiative aims to provide infrastructure for frictionless internet payments, bypassing regulatory and partnership hurdles. Dorsey's commitment to building crypto infrastructure signals a long-term belief in its potential and could drive significant adoption.
long_term.rationale: Jack Dorsey's direct involvement in building crypto infrastructure through Square signals a strong commitment to the ecosystem. This focus on frictionless payments can drive significant adoption and utility for cryptocurrencies.

short_term.title: Bitcoin Falls as Facebook Warns Libra Might Never Launch
short_term.summary: Bitcoin experienced a 2.6% drop as Facebook's quarterly report warned that its Libra cryptocurrency might not launch in a timely manner, or at all, due to significant regulatory scrutiny. This news creates uncertainty around a major potential catalyst for crypto adoption, likely leading to short-term price weakness.
short_term.rationale: Facebook's warning about Libra's uncertain launch due to regulatory pressure directly impacts market sentiment, causing a short-term price decline for Bitcoin.

short_term.title: Bitcoin Falls as Facebook Warns Libra Might Never Launch
short_term.summary: Bitcoin fell 2.6% as Facebook's quarterly report indicated Libra might not launch as planned due to significant regulatory scrutiny. This news introduces uncertainty around a major potential driver for crypto adoption, likely causing a short-term bearish sentiment and price pressure.
short_term.rationale: The uncertainty surrounding Facebook's Libra launch, stemming from regulatory concerns, is a direct negative catalyst for Bitcoin's price in the immediate short term.

short_term.title: Bitcoin Cash – ABC, Litecoin and Ripple Daily Analysis – 30/07/19
short_term.summary: Bitcoin Cash ABC fell by 1.88% on Monday, reversing Sunday's gains. The price action shows a struggle to maintain upward momentum, falling short of resistance levels and ending the day in the red. This indicates short-term bearish pressure on altcoins, potentially dragging Bitcoin down.
short_term.rationale: The negative price action in Bitcoin Cash ABC suggests broader weakness in altcoins, which can negatively impact Bitcoin's price in the very short term.

short_term.title: Only 4% of Americans see Bitcoin as long-term investment
short_term.summary: A survey indicates only 4% of Americans view Bitcoin as a long-term investment, with real estate being the preferred option for 31%. This low retail investor confidence could limit demand and price appreciation in the short to medium term, suggesting a lack of broad public adoption as a stable investment.
short_term.rationale: Low retail investor confidence in Bitcoin as a long-term asset could dampen demand and create selling pressure in the short term.

short_term.title: USD/JPY Fundamental Daily Forecast – BOJ Could Adopt ‘Wait and See’ Strategy
short_term.summary: The USD/JPY pair closed higher as investors anticipate a dovish tone from the Bank of Japan's upcoming monetary policy statement. This suggests a potential weakening of the Yen, which could indirectly influence global risk assets like Bitcoin if it signals broader monetary easing or economic uncertainty.
short_term.rationale: Anticipation of dovish BoJ policy could impact global liquidity and risk appetite, creating indirect, albeit uncertain, short-term effects on Bitcoin.

short_term.title: BitFlyer Launches ‘Simple’ Bitcoin Buying and Selling Service for EU Market
short_term.summary: BitFlyer Europe has launched a simplified Bitcoin buying and selling service targeting beginners and experienced traders in the EU market. This expansion of accessible on-ramps for fiat-to-crypto conversion can increase trading volume and liquidity in the short term.
short_term.rationale: The launch of a user-friendly service by a European exchange can facilitate easier access to Bitcoin for new users, potentially boosting short-term trading volume.

short_term.title: Golden Cross Provides Glimmer of Hope for Bitcoin Price Revival
short_term.summary: Bitcoin's three-day chart shows a 'golden cross,' a long-term bullish indicator, for the first time since February 2016. This technical signal, occurring less than a year before the next halving, suggests a potential price revival. Short-term charts also indicate seller exhaustion, pointing to a possible rise back to $10,000.
short_term.rationale: The 'golden cross' on the three-day chart, combined with signs of seller exhaustion, suggests a strong short-term bullish momentum, potentially pushing Bitcoin towards $10,000.

short_term.title: Bitcoin’s Largest Wallet Blockchain Just Launched Its First Crypto Exchange
short_term.summary: Blockchain.com, a major wallet provider with nearly 40 million wallets, has launched its first exchange, 'The PIT,' in London. This move aims to attract liquidity by connecting to non-custodial wallets for instant transfers. The launch of a new, well-funded exchange could increase trading volume and competition.
short_term.rationale: The launch of a new exchange by a major wallet provider like Blockchain.com can increase market liquidity and trading activity in the short term.

short_term.title: Circle CEO Allaire to Congress: Treat Crypto as a New Asset Class
short_term.summary: Circle CEO Jeremy Allaire will testify before the U.S. Senate Banking Committee, advocating for crypto to be treated as a new asset class. This hearing could influence regulatory approaches. Positive regulatory sentiment or clarity could boost short-term market confidence.
short_term.rationale: Testimony advocating for crypto as an asset class before a Senate committee could lead to positive regulatory sentiment, impacting short-term price action.

short_term.title: Circle CEO Allaire to Congress: Treat Crypto as a New Asset Class
short_term.summary: Circle CEO Jeremy Allaire is set to testify before the U.S. Senate Banking Committee, urging them to classify cryptocurrencies as a distinct asset class. This testimony could shape regulatory discussions and potentially lead to more favorable frameworks, influencing short-term market sentiment.
short_term.rationale: The outcome of the Senate hearing where Circle's CEO advocates for crypto as an asset class could influence regulatory sentiment and market confidence in the short term.

daily_view.summary: Bitcoin experienced a slight downturn today, influenced by Facebook's cautionary statements regarding the launch of its Libra cryptocurrency, raising concerns about regulatory hurdles. However, technical indicators like the 'golden cross' on longer timeframes suggest potential for a near-term revival, with some analysts anticipating a return to $10,000. The launch of new exchanges and simplified on-ramps by companies like Blockchain.com and BitFlyer offer positive infrastructure developments. Meanwhile, regulatory discussions in the US, with Circle CEO testifying, could shape future market sentiment.
key_risks: Continued regulatory uncertainty surrounding Libra and broader crypto regulations.
Potential for further negative sentiment from retail investors regarding long-term prospects.
Macroeconomic factors and shifts in global liquidity could impact risk assets.
Technical resistance levels may cap short-term price gains.
watch_items: Facebook's Libra project developments and regulatory responses.
Upcoming US Senate Banking Committee hearing on cryptocurrencies.
Bitcoin's ability to hold the $9,500 support level.
Performance of major altcoins as indicators of broader market health.
